comment: It's an overall boring class due to the University. However, she tries to make it interesting. There are only two exams. Nothing too hard with the right amount of studying. Quizzes on almost every chapter. She's an overall great person who is there for her students.
Loved Professor Holloway! Made an 8pm class interesting and fun. Tests are online - and open note. show up to class!!

The class itself was very boring but Professor Holloway is such a great professor. She fits in & gets along with her students very well. Shes a very lenient grader and wants to she her students succeed
